turns.content: write my story in an intriguing and engaging way: I started in Real Estate by accident when a friend told me about a way to purchase a property by using money from my 401K, but the amazing thing about it is after we purchased the property we were able to borrow money from the rental property using a equity line of credit and that is how we purchased our second property and third property. After 3 years we had acquired 14 doors and close to a million profolio. Then the amazing thing happened is I was introduced to Hotel investing by enrolling in a mastermind course with Davonne Reaves, this introduced me to a whole new world of investing and I was able to invest in a hotel. Being a part of Nassau Mastermind is expanding my view of what is possible with hotel and multi-family investing. I say all this to say just start and the universe with meet you where you are. Real Estate investing is providing me the opportunity to leave a legacy for my family, it changed my life and it can change yours too, let me know if you are interested in passively investing.

It all started with a casual conversation with a friend. Little did I know that it would lead me down a path that would change my life forever. My friend told me about a little-known secret of using money from my 401K to purchase a property. It was a way to invest in real estate without dipping into my savings or taking out a loan. I was intrigued.

So, I decided to give it a try. After all, what did I have to lose? We purchased our first property, and to our surprise, we were able to borrow money from the rental property using an equity line of credit. This was the golden ticket to purchasing our second and third properties. It was like a domino effect, and we couldn't believe our luck.

In just three short years, we had acquired 14 doors and close to a million-dollar portfolio. I never thought I would be a real estate investor, but here I was, making money in my sleep.

But that was just the beginning. The universe had bigger plans for me. I was introduced to Hotel investing through a mastermind course with Davonne Reaves. This opened up a whole new world of investing that I never knew existed.

I was fascinated by the idea of owning a hotel, and I knew I had to do it. I invested in a hotel, and it was the best decision I ever made. Being a part of the Nassau Mastermind is expanding my view of what is possible with hotel and multi-family investing.

Real estate investing has given me the opportunity to leave a legacy for my family. It has changed my life in ways I never thought possible. And it can change yours too.

If you're interested in passively investing, let me know. I'm always looking for like-minded individuals who want to make their money work for them. So, don't be afraid to take that first step. You never know where it might lead you. The universe has a way of meeting you where you are, and for me, that was in real estate investing.
Create me a post for social media

Are you tired of just working for a paycheck? Want to make your money work for you instead? Real estate investing is the way to go!

I stumbled upon real estate investing by accident when a friend told me about a little-known secret of using money from my 401K to purchase a property. And the amazing thing is, we were able to borrow money from the rental property using an equity line of credit, and that's how we purchased our second and third properties.

Fast forward to today, and I've acquired 14 doors and close to a million-dollar portfolio! But that's not all, I've been introduced to hotel investing through a mastermind course with Davonne Reaves, and it's opened up a whole new world of investing that I never knew existed.

Real estate investing has given me the opportunity to leave a legacy for my family. It's changed my life in ways I never thought possible, and it can do the same for you too.

If you're interested in passively investing, let's talk! Don't be afraid to take that first step. The universe has a way of meeting you where you are, and for me, that was in real estate investing.

Sign up now and be a part of a movement towards social justice and health equity. Let's work together to create a society where Black women can thrive and live their best lives. Join the B.O.S.S Life Design program today! #BOSSLifeDesign #BlackGirlMagic #StressManagement #HealthEquity #SocialJustice #JoinTheMovement

Don't let chronic stress control your life any longer. Take the first step towards a more balanced and fulfilling life with the B.O.S.S Life Design program. #BOSSLifeDesign #StressManagement #HealthEquity #JoinTheMovement #ComingSoon.

Another great money mindset quote is by Jim Rohn: "Formal education will make you a living, self-education will make you a fortune." This quote emphasizes the importance of continuous learning and personal development in building wealth and financial success. It suggests that while formal education can provide you with the skills to make a living, it's the ongoing self-education and learning that can lead to greater financial abundance and success. So, never stop learning and investing in yourself, as it can be the key to unlocking greater wealth and prosperity.
give me a live script on imposter syndrome

Sure, here's a live script on imposter syndrome:

Hello everyone and welcome to our discussion on imposter syndrome. Today, we'll be talking about what imposter syndrome is, how it affects us, and what we can do about it.

Imposter syndrome is a phenomenon that affects many people, regardless of their age, gender, or background. It's the feeling that you don't belong or that you're not good enough, despite evidence to the contrary. You may feel like a fraud or that you've somehow fooled others into thinking that you're more capable than you actually are.

This feeling of inadequacy can have a profound impact on our lives, causing us to doubt ourselves, hold back, and miss out on opportunities. We may even self-sabotage or avoid taking risks, fearing that we'll be exposed as a fraud.

But the truth is, imposter syndrome is more common than we realize, and it's something that we can overcome. One of the first steps is to recognize and acknowledge these feelings, to understand that they're not unique to us and that many others have experienced them too.

It's also important to reframe our thinking and focus on our strengths and accomplishments, rather than our perceived shortcomings. We can practice self-compassion and remind ourselves that making mistakes and experiencing failures is a natural part of growth and learning.

Another helpful strategy is to seek support and guidance from others, whether it's through talking with a trusted friend or mentor, or seeking professional help from a therapist or coach.

Remember, you are not alone in experiencing imposter syndrome, and there are many strategies that can help you overcome these feelings and thrive in your personal and professional life.

Thank you for joining us today, and we hope this discussion has been helpful in understanding imposter syndrome and how we can overcome it.
Write me a pitch statement for this program

Sure, here's a pitch statement for the B.O.S.S. Life Design program:

Are you a high-achieving woman of color struggling with stress and overwhelm, despite your impressive accomplishments? Do you yearn for a life of holistic well-being and fulfillment, but don't know where to start? The B.O.S.S. Life Design program is here to empower you to turn the page towards a life of your own design.

Our ten-week self-development program provides a supportive community-based approach to helping you define your values, aspirations, and purpose. Through our unique process, you'll assess your life across the eight dimensions of wellness, prioritize areas for change, and craft a sustainability plan for continued growth.

With the B.O.S.S. Book - a guided digital journal - and live community sessions, you'll have the support and encouragement you need to achieve your goals and live a life of holistic well-being. We believe that by accepting the title of B.O.S.S. and crafting the book of your own life, you can unlock your true potential and make aligned, empowered choices.

Don't settle for a life of stress and overwhelm. Join the B.O.S.S. Life Design program and embrace your inner B.O.S.S., as you turn the page towards a life of holistic well-being and fulfillment.
